translation.en: Yeah, that is some detail. That is some Western detail right there.
translation.es: Sí, es un gran detalle. Un detalle occidental.

translation.en: Western detail. Attention to detail.
He's even got spurs on the back of his boots and they're sharp.
translation.es: Hasta tiene espuelas en las botas, y son filosas.

translation.en: -Love it. -They are.
The clock is gone on this piece, Christine, so....
translation.es: A esta pieza le falta el reloj, Christine...

translation.en: -Oh, my goodness -Well, let's just move on.
Well, from time to time, people make mistakes, that's okay.
translation.es: De vez en cuando, la gente comete errores, eso está bien.

translation.en: This is our first Renoir of the evening.
translation.es: Es nuestro primer Renoir de la noche.

translation.en: This is a heliogravure, which is an etching...
...it was hand pulled from a copperplate in Paris in 1919.
translation.es: ...tomado a mano de una plancha de cobre, en París en 1919.

translation.en: We know this because that's what it says on the back...
translation.es: Lo sabemos porque lo dice al dorso...

translation.en: ...where the certificate of authenticity is located. Just as lovely as can be.
translation.es: ...donde se encuentra el certificado de autenticidad. Encantador.

translation.en: Look at the soft, delicate shading, very feminine.
translation.es: Observen su tonalidad suave, delicada, muy femenina.

translation.en: This is a limited edition.
This is what you're looking for if you are a Renoir fan.
translation.es: Esto es lo que busca todo admirador de Renoir.

translation.en: One hundred, oh, my goodness. Right at the buzzer.
translation.es: Cien, Dios mío. Justo a tiempo.

translation.en: Good.
--the few exceptions is the African pancake tortoise...
translation.es: ...excepciones son la tortuga de las grietas...

translation.en: ...which has a flat, flexible shell that allows it to hide in rock crevasses--
translation.es: ...de caparazón flexible y plano que le permite ocultarse en grietas...

translation.en: --big swath of light to moderate snow from the Broken Bow area...
translation.es: ...franja de nieve liviana a moderada desde la zona de Broken Bow...

translation.en: ...down toward Kearney, Hastings, Grand Island.
That is all moving in our direction, so I do think around 7 to 8:00...
translation.es: Todo avanza en nuestra dirección, así que entre 7:00 y 8:00...

translation.en: ...the snow will become pretty steady here across the region...
translation.es: ...la nieve será bastante constante en la región...

translation.en: ...with all this moving on top of us...
...and that's really gonna knock down visibility.
And again, snow-covered roads are gonna be definitely likely this evening...
translation.es: Y es muy probable que esta noche los caminos se cubran de nieve...

translation.en: ...making it even slippier-- More slippery. --than it is out there at this time.
translation.es: ...y los volverá más resbaladizos que en este momento.

translation.en: There's that winter weather advisory in effect till very early tomorrow morning.
translation.es: Es la recomendación climática invernal hasta mañana por la mañana.

translation.en: The bitter cold weather helped break up the compactions...
translation.es: El frío ayudó a separar las compactaciones...

translation.en: ...we created this fall in our fields.
translation.es: ...que creamos en nuestros campos este otoño.

translation.en: Don't let false allegations bully you into an unfair fight.
translation.es: No dejen que falsos argumentos los lleven a una pelea injusta.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Saul Goodman, and I will do the fighting for you.
translation.es: Hola, soy Saul Goodman, y lucharé por ti.

translation.en: No charge is too big for me.
translation.es: No hay acusación demasiado grave para mí.

translation.en: When legal forces have you cornered, better call Saul.
translation.es: Cuando la ley te tenga acorralado, mejor llama a Saul.

translation.en: I'll get your case dismissed. I'll give you the defense you deserve.
translation.es: Haré que sobresean tu caso. Te daré la defensa que mereces.

translation.en: Why? Because I'm Saul Goodman, attorney at law.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Porque soy Saul Goodman, abogado.

translation.en: I investigate, advocate, persuade, and most importantly, win.
translation.es: Investigo, defiendo, convenzo y lo más importante, gano.

translation.en: Better call Saul.
Do you feel doomed?
Have opponents of freedom wrongly intimidated you?
translation.es: ¿Te intimidan los que se oponen a la libertad?

translation.en: Maybe they told you you're in serious trouble and there's nothing you can do.
translation.es: Quizá te dijeron que estás en graves problemas y nada puedes hacer.

translation.en: I'm Saul Goodman, and I'm here to tell you that they're wrong.
translation.es: Soy Saul Goodman, y vengo a decirte que se equivocan.

translation.en: It's never too late for justice. Better call....
translation.es: Nunca es demasiado tarde para la justicia. Mejor llama...

translation.en: I think...
...your brain is just not all there yet.
translation.es: ...tu cerebro no está del todo allí todavía.

translation.en: If we were all held responsible for what we did when we were 19....
translation.es: Si a todos nos hicieran responsables por lo que hicimos a los 19 años...

translation.en: I remember what it was like to be a kid. Think back.
translation.es: Recuerdo lo que era ser un muchacho. Recuerda.

translation.en: It's all-- Judge, what would you say?
These boys, 19, I can't-- I don't--
translation.es: Estos muchachos, 19, no puedo... Yo no...

translation.en: These three young men, just like you.
translation.es: Estos tres jóvenes, al igual que usted.

translation.en: Just like....
Oh, to be 19 again. You with me, ladies and gentlemen?
translation.es: Volver a tener 19 años. ¿Me siguen, damas y caballeros?

translation.en: Do you remember 19?
Let me tell you, the juices are flowing, the red corpuscles are corpuscling...
translation.es: Les diré, los fluidos fluyen, los glóbulos rojos globulan...

translation.en: ...the grass is green and it's soft, and summer's gonna last forever.
translation.es: ...el pasto es verde y suave, y el verano será eterno.

translation.en: Now do you remember? Yeah, you do.
But if you're being honest, I mean, really honest...
translation.es: Pero si son sinceros, realmente sinceros...

translation.en: ...you'll recall that you also had an underdeveloped 19-year-old brain.
translation.es: ...también recordarán que tuvieron cerebro de 19 años no desarrollado.

translation.en: Me, personally...
...if I were held accountable...
...for some of the stupid decisions I made when I was 19, oh, boy, wow.
translation.es: ...de algunas decisiones estúpidas que tomé a mis 19 años, cielos.

translation.en: And I bet if we were in church right now, I'd get a big "amen."
translation.es: Y si estuviéramos en la iglesia, oiría un fuerte amén.

translation.en: Which brings us to these three.
translation.es: Lo cual nos lleva a estos tres.

translation.en: Now, these three knuckleheads--
translation.es: Ahora bien, estos tres cabezas huecas...

translation.en: And I'm sorry, boys, but that's what you are.
translation.es: Y, lo siento, chicos, pero eso son.

translation.en: --they did a dumb thing. We're not denying that.
However, I would like you to remember two salient facts.
translation.es: Pero, quisiera que recordaran dos hechos principales.

translation.en: Fact one, nobody got hurt. Not a soul. Very important to keep that in mind.
translation.es: Uno, que nadie salió herido. Nadie. Es muy importante considerar eso.

translation.en: Fact two....
Now, the prosecution keeps bandying this term "criminal trespass."
translation.es: El fiscal no deja de lanzar la frase allanamiento ilegal de morada.

translation.en: Mr. Spinauzo, the property owner, admitted to us...
translation.es: El Sr. Spinauzo, el dueño, admitió ante nosotros...

translation.en: ...that he keeps most portions of his business...
translation.es: ...que mantiene la mayor parte del local...

translation.en: ...open to the public both day and night.
translation.es: ...abierto al público tanto de noche como de día.

translation.en: So trespassing?
It's a bit of a reach, don't you think, Dave?
translation.es: Es un poco exagerado, ¿no crees, Dave?

translation.en: Here's what I know.
These three young men, near honor students all...
translation.es: Estos tres jóvenes, todos casi estudiantes de honor...

translation.en: ...were feeling their oats one Saturday night and they just...
translation.es: ...un sábado por la noche se sentían eufóricos y simplemente...

translation.en: ...went a little bananas.
I don't know. Call me crazy, but I don't think they deserve...
translation.es: No sé. Llámenme loco, pero no creo que merezcan...

translation.en: ...to have their bright futures ruined by a momentary, minute...
translation.es: ...que se les arruine su brillante futuro por una falta de criterio...

translation.en: ...never-to-be-repeated lapse of judgment.
translation.es: ...momentánea, insignificante, que no se volverá a repetir.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen...
...you're bigger than that.
-Kenny, are you rolling? -Yeah, wait a minute.
-Yeah, baby. Yeah. -Tone it down. Chill out, would you?
Hey, Miss Watson's fourth period biology class, this one's for you.
translation.es: Para usted, Srta. Watson, cuarto período, clase de biología.

translation.en: -Watch and learn, losers. -Oh, yeah.
-Oh, God. -Dude, where'd all the blood go?
He's dead. They suck it all out, dumb-ass.
translation.es: Está muerto. La chuparán toda, idiota.

translation.en: -Awesome. -Where do they put it?
All right, I'm through the neck bone now, dude.
translation.es: Terminé con el hueso del cuello, viejo.

translation.en: -Kenny, get over here. -I'm getting it.
-Get a shot of this. -Fine, fine.
-Let me do it. -I got it.
All right.
-All right. -Oh, my God.
-You're sawing like a pussy. Let me do it. -Would you get off? Chill out.
-All right. -Wait, wait. Okay. Wait for it. Wait.
Yeah.
-Come on. Yeah, baby. Yeah. -Oh, my God.
I dare you to stick your wang in the throat hole.
translation.es: Mete tu pito en el agujero de la garganta.

translation.en: I will if you will, loser.
translation.es: Lo haré, si tú lo haces, perdedor.

translation.en: All right, all right.
-What the hell kind of math is that? -Seven hundred per defense.
No, no, no. "Defendant." "Dant."
Three defendants, 2100.
Which, by the way, bargain. What I did for them....
translation.es: Que es barato. Lo que hice por ellos...

translation.en: They going to jail, ain't they?
So since when does that matter? They had sex with a head.
translation.es: ¿Y desde cuándo importa eso? Tuvieron sexo con una cabeza.

translation.en: Look, didn't nobody tell you to try all three of them together.
translation.es: Nadie le dijo que los defendiera a todos juntos.

translation.en: -One trial, $700. -You're gonna miss me.
You are gonna miss me because it'll be a cold day in hell...
translation.es: Me extrañarán, pues hará frío en el infierno...

translation.en: ...before I do any more PD work for this shitty court. Sayonara, baby.
translation.es: ...antes que vuelva a trabajar para este maldito tribunal. Sayonara.

translation.en: You have yourself a nice day.
Law offices of James McGill, how may I direct your call?
translation.es: Estudio jurídico de James McGill, ¿adónde dirijo su llamada?

translation.en: Yes, Mrs. Kettleman, so good of you to return.
translation.es: Sí, Sra. Kettleman, qué bueno escucharla de nuevo.

translation.en: Actually, I don't have Mr. McGill at the moment, but I know he--
translation.es: De hecho, el Sr. McGill no está en este momento, pero sé...

translation.en: Oh, splendid.
Unfortunately, our offices are being painted...
...and the fumes are quite horrid.
Could he meet you and your husband at, say, Loyola's Café on Central?
translation.es: ¿Podría él reunirse con usted y su esposo, digamos, en el Café Loyola?

translation.en: Four o'clock it shall be. Cheers.
Three dollars.
I'm validated. See the stickers?
Well, I see five stickers. You're one shy. That's $3.
translation.es: Veo cinco calcomanías. Falta una. Son tres dólares.

translation.en: They gave me-- Look, I'm validated for the entire day, okay?
translation.es: Me dieron... Mire, estoy exento por todo el día, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: Five stickers, six stickers, I don't know from stickers because...
translation.es: Cinco calcomanías, seis calcomanías, no sé, porque...

translation.en: ...I was in that court back there saving people's lives, so....
translation.es: ...estuve en ese tribunal salvando vidas, así que...

translation.en: Gee, that's swell.
And thank you for restoring my faith in the judicial system.
translation.es: Y gracias por devolverme la fe en el sistema judicial.

translation.en: Now, you either pay the $3...
translation.es: Ahora, me paga los tres dólares...

translation.en: ...or you go back inside and you get an additional sticker.
translation.es: ...o vuelve adentro y consigue otra calcomanía.

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
Fine. You win. Hooray for you.
translation.es: Está bien. Usted gana. Hurra por usted.

translation.en: Backing up. I have to back up. I need more stickers.
translation.es: Tengo que retroceder. Necesito más calcomanías.

translation.en: Don't have enough stickers.
Thank you. Thank you. Very nice.
Employee of the month over here.
Yeah. Hooray. Give him a medal.
Don't do anything, guys. Just relax, all right?
translation.es: No hagan nada, amigos. Solo relájense, ¿sí?

translation.en: Well, I'm just fuzzy as to why you think he needs a lawyer.
translation.es: Bueno, no entiendo por qué usted cree que él necesita un abogado.

translation.en: I mean, Craig, the way you run your office is beyond reproach.
translation.es: Digo, Craig, tu forma de administrar tu oficina es irreprochable.

translation.en: -Beyond reproach. -Yeah.
-I'm a stickler, you know-- -He is. He's a stickler with the money.
-He's definitely a stickler. -Yeah. Yeah.
-He's certainly not guilty of some-- -Certainly not.
translation.es: -Y no es culpable de ningún... -Claro que no.

translation.en: He's innocent of any wrongdoing, that's abundantly clear to me.
translation.es: Es inocente de todo delito, eso está sumamente claro para mí.

translation.en: And frankly, I don't go looking for guilty people to represent.
translation.es: Y francamente, no ando buscando culpables que representar.

translation.en: I mean, who needs that aggravation, right?
Right.
Look, all I know is what I read in the paper.
translation.es: Miren, solo sé lo que leo en el periódico.

translation.en: And typically when money goes missing from the county treasury--
translation.es: Típicamente, si falta dinero del condado...

translation.en: -And the number here is 1.6 million? -Well, that's an accounting discrepancy.
translation.es: -...¿y aquí hablamos de 1,6 millones? -Es una discrepancia contable.

translation.en: It's a discrepancy, absolutely. But typically when that happens...
translation.es: Una discrepancia, totalmente. Pero, típicamente, si pasa eso...

translation.en: ...the police look at the treasurer.
And since that person is....
I just think a little proactivity may be in order.
translation.es: Creo que sería aconsejable ser un poco proactivos.

translation.en: I just think I'd look guilty if I hired a lawyer.
translation.es: Creo que parecería culpable si contratara un abogado.

translation.en: Yeah.
Actually, it's getting arrested that makes people look guilty...
translation.es: Que lo arresten es lo que hace parecer culpable a la gente.

translation.en: ...even the innocent ones.
And innocent people get arrested every day.
translation.es: Y arrestan inocentes todos los días.

translation.en: And they find themselves in a little room...
translation.es: Y se encuentran en un cuartito...

translation.en: ...with a detective who acts like he's their best friend.
translation.es: ...con un detective que actúa como si fuera su mejor amigo.

translation.en: "Talk to me," he says. "Help me clear this thing up."
translation.es: Hable conmigo, dice. Ayúdeme a aclarar esto.

translation.en: "You don't need a lawyer, only guilty people need lawyers."
translation.es: No necesita un abogado, solo los culpables lo necesitan.

translation.en: And, boom, hey, that's when it all goes south.
translation.es: Y, pum, allí se precipita todo.

translation.en: That's when you want someone in your corner.
translation.es: Es ahí cuando uno quiere tener apoyo.

translation.en: Someone who will fight tooth and nail.
Lawyers, we're like health insurance.
translation.es: Abogados, somos como el seguro de salud.

translation.en: You hope you never need it, but, man, oh, man, not having it? No.
translation.es: Uno espera no necesitarlo nunca, pero ¿no tenerlo? No.

translation.en: How would we proceed if we decided to--?
Well, this is a letter of engagement.
translation.es: Esta es una contrato de prestación de servicios.

translation.en: It's very simple, straightforward. Please, read it closely.
translation.es: Es muy simple, clara. Por favor, léanla con atención.

translation.en: But if you sign it...
...I can get started on that defense strategy of ours...
...this very afternoon.
Craig...
...I think maybe we should sleep on it.
Sure.
-Don't you think, Mr. McGill? -We should sleep on it.
Oh, please, call me Jimmy.
Absolutely. I mean, there's no rush.
Oh, and you know, Craig, we gotta pick up the kids.
translation.es: Y, sabes, Craig, debemos ir a buscar a los niños.

translation.en: -At the.... -Right.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
Well, we will be in touch.
Thank you for the coffee, and for the advice.
translation.es: Gracias por el café, y por el consejo.

translation.en: You're very, very welcome.
Here. Take this. It's got my phone number on it.
translation.es: Tomen. Aquí está mi número de teléfono.

translation.en: -Yeah. Okay. -Got it.
The number is 9456, 0054...
...4896, 0643, and the expiration is 11, '04.
Okay, and the key word here is "classy," all right? Super classy.
translation.es: Bien, y la palabra clave es elegante. Súper elegante.

translation.en: Use only flowers that look expensive, but, you know, aren't.
translation.es: Use flores que parezcan caras, pero que no lo sean.

translation.en: And the note should say:
"Dear Betsy and Craig.
Best wishes from your stickler for justice, James McGill."
translation.es: Todo lo mejor de su perfeccionista de la justicia, James McGill.

translation.en: Okay? And McGill is spelled M-C--
Well, run it again.
Well, no, no, no. It's paid up. Run it again--
translation.es: No, no. Está pagada. Vuelva a buscar.

translation.en: Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
Oh, my God, Cal. Cal. Look at me.
Buddy, look at me. Are you okay? Say something.
What did you do? What did you do to my brother?
translation.es: ¿Qué hizo? ¿Qué le hizo a mi hermano?

translation.en: -Why don't you look where you're going? -He came out of nowhere.
translation.es: -¿Por qué no mira por dónde va? -Salió de la nada.

translation.en: You freaking hit him, man. You ran him over.
You ran over my brother.
-I got the whole thing on video. -It was an accident.
translation.es: -Lo tengo todo en video. -Fue un accidente.

translation.en: It was an accident. He didn't-- He didn't mean to. Look, let me just--
translation.es: Fue un accidente. Él no... No tuvo intención. Déjame que...

translation.en: -It's broke. Is it broke? -It's my leg.
-You broke his leg. -It's my leg.
Why you driving around and not looking? Driving around breaking people's legs.
translation.es: ¿Por qué conduce sin mirar? Conduce por ahí rompiendo piernas.

translation.en: -Okay. -Somebody call the cops.
-Don't call-- Don't call the police. -Police.
-Don't call the police. Don't call the police. -Call them myself.
translation.es: -No llamen a la policía. No. -Llamaré yo mismo.

translation.en: -Don't call the police. -Don't call the cops?
translation.es: -No llames a la policía. -¿Que no llame?

translation.en: -No. -How you gonna fix this?
What are you gonna do to make things right?
I don't know, fellas.
What can I do to make it right?
translation.es: ¿Qué puedo hacer para reparar las cosas?

translation.en: I don't know.
Five hundred dollars.
Five hundred bucks? Yeah?
Yeah.
-What the hell, man? -Listen, Starlight Express.
I'm gonna give you a 9.6 for technique, 0.0 for choice of victim.
translation.es: Los califico con un 9,6 por técnica, y cero por elección de víctima.

translation.en: I'm a lawyer.
Furthermore, does this steaming pile of crap...
...scream "payday" to you, huh?
The only way that entire car is worth 500 bucks...
...is if there's a $300 hooker sitting in it.
translation.es: ...si se sentara una prostituta de 300 dólares.

translation.en: Now, let's talk about what you owe me for the windshield.
translation.es: Ahora hablemos de lo que me deben por el parabrisas.

translation.en: I'll take a check.
Chào cô, ladies.
Chào cô, Mrs. Nguyen. My, don't you look...?
translation.es: Chào cô, Sra. Nguyen. Cielos, luce...

translation.en: My mail?
You work for people who have sex with chopped-off head?
translation.es: ¿Trabaja para gente que tiene sexo con una cabeza decapitada?

translation.en: -Was it in the paper? -I heard it from my cousin.
translation.es: -¿Salió en el periódico? -Me lo contó mi primo.

translation.en: Why? Why you work for these people?
translation.es: ¿Por qué? ¿Por qué trabaja para esa gente?

translation.en: Just lucky, I guess.
Cucumber water for customer only.
translation.es: El agua de pepino es solo para clientes.

translation.en: You have zero messages.
Brenda, looking good.
Nice 'do. Where's Lord Vader?
-He's not quite ready for you yet. -South conference room.
translation.es: -No está listo para Ud. aún. -Sala de conferencias sur.

translation.en: -How about you wait out here? -How about I don't?
translation.es: -¿Qué tal si espera aquí? -¿Qué tal si no lo hago?

translation.en: Oh, Sir Francis.
-James. -Well groomed, as always.
-Okay. -All right.
Keith, Karen. Yes.
You have meddled with the primal forces of nature, Mr. Hamlin...
translation.es: ¡Se ha metido con fuerzas primarias de la naturaleza, Sr. Hamlin...

translation.en: ...and I won't have it.
-Do you want me to call security? -It's okay, Brenda. We got it.
translation.es: -¿Quiere que llame a seguridad? -Está bien, Brenda. Todo controlado.

translation.en: -Hey, Jack. Hey, Nate. Hey, Aaron. -What can we do for you, Jimmy?
translation.es: -Hola, Jack. Hola, Nate. Aaron. -¿Qué podemos hacer por ti, Jimmy?

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's this table.
Something just comes over me.
You can tell me what this 26,000 is supposed to be for.
translation.es: Pueden decirme a qué se supone que corresponden estos 26 000.

translation.en: That's money for Chuck. Isn't that what you wanted?
translation.es: Es dinero por Chuck. ¿No es lo que querías?

translation.en: A measly 26 grand? Jesus, you're like Peter Minuit with the Indians.
translation.es: ¿Míseros 26 mil? Dios, eres como Peter Minuit con los aborígenes.

translation.en: Throw in some beads and shells while you're at it.
It's just a start, there'll be more. Unless you're gonna just tear them all up.
translation.es: Es para empezar, habrá más. Salvo que los rompas todos.

translation.en: And why was it made out to me? Why not Chuck?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué me lo hicieron a mí? ¿Por qué no a Chuck?

translation.en: Can he make his way to the bank?
I just assumed it was best to have the money go through you.
translation.es: Supuse que era mejor darle el dinero a través de ti.

translation.en: We can do it any way you want.
This isn't going away, Howard.
translation.es: Esto no va a desaparecer, Howard.

translation.en: What Chuck did for this firm, and damn near single-handedly...
translation.es: Lo que Chuck hizo por este bufete, y prácticamente solo...

translation.en: ...one-third of this place belongs to him. Yeah.
translation.es: ...un tercio de este lugar le pertenece. Sí.

translation.en: What have you got, 12 chairs here? Four of these chairs are Chuck's.
translation.es: ¿Cuántas sillas hay aquí, 12? Cuatro son de Chuck.

translation.en: You got five of these light thingamajigs...
translation.es: Cinco de estos artefactos de luz...

translation.en: ...one and two-thirds are Chuck's. Yeah.
translation.es: ...uno y dos tercios son de Chuck. Sí.

translation.en: How many Danishes? Six Danishes?
-You can have all the Danish you want. -No, no. They're Chuck's Danishes.
translation.es: -Ten todos los que quieras. -No. Son los pastelillos de Chuck.

translation.en: And Chuck isn't greedy, so he'll just take two...
translation.es: Y Chuck no es codicioso, solo querrá dos...

translation.en: ...plus $17 million. In that ballpark.
I mean, we'll know once we get the accountants poking around here.
translation.es: Lo sabremos cuando los contadores vengan a revisar.

translation.en: Until then, no more penny ante checks designed to make it look...
translation.es: Hasta entonces, basta de cheques de anticipos para que parezca...

translation.en: ...like Chuck still works here. He doesn't. He never will again.
translation.es: ...que Chuck aún trabaja aquí. No lo hace. Ni lo hará más.

translation.en: It's time to do right by him, and cash him out.
translation.es: Es hora de hacer lo correcto para él y pagarle.

translation.en: So these are Chuck's own wishes that you're conveying?
translation.es: ¿Estás expresando los propios deseos de Chuck?

translation.en: This is what's best for him.
So he personally told you that it's his wish to withdraw from the firm?
translation.es: ¿Él mismo te dijo que quiere retirarse del bufete?

translation.en: See, that would surprise me.
It's been nearly a year since he set foot in here.
translation.es: Hace casi un año que no pisa este lugar.

translation.en: -I'm just doing what's in his best interests. -So am I.
translation.es: -Hago lo mejor para sus intereses. -Yo también.

translation.en: And I, for one, believe he's gonna lick this thing.
translation.es: Y yo, por mi parte, creo que él superará esto.

translation.en: Until then, his office is just as he left it. His secretary is still on payroll.
translation.es: Hasta entonces, su oficina está como la dejó. Su secretaria aún cobra.

translation.en: If Chuck can call this an extended sabbatical, then so can we.
translation.es: Si Chuck lo llama año sabático extendido, también nosotros.

translation.en: He's that important to us.
translation.es: Así de importante es para nosotros.

translation.en: You know what? Let's let a jury figure it out.
translation.es: ¿Saben qué? Dejemos que un jurado lo resuelva.

translation.en: Yeah. They're gonna love you, Howard.
You're so down to earth and relatable.
translation.es: Tan centrado, uno se puede identificar contigo.

translation.en: And you will atone.
It's Ned Beatty from Network.
translation.es: Palabras de Ned Beatty en Network.

translation.en: For chrissakes, guys.
Jimmy.
I almost forgot. This month's filings.
translation.es: Casi lo olvido. Los casos de este mes.

translation.en: You can save me the postage.
Weren't you listening in there? Chuck doesn't work here anymore.
translation.es: ¿No escuchaste lo que dije allí? Chuck ya no trabaja aquí.

translation.en: Think I'm gonna help you establish a paper trail?
translation.es: ¿Crees que te ayudaré a dejar rastro de papeleo?

translation.en: -Jimmy-- -Stop trying to pawn that shit off on him.
Jimmy.
You know, Jimmy, sometimes in our line of work...
translation.es: Jimmy, a veces, en nuestro trabajo...

translation.en: ...you can get so caught up in the idea of winning...
translation.es: ...quedas tan atrapado con la idea de ganar...

translation.en: ...that you forget to listen to your heart.
Give Chuck my love, would you?
Oh, there you are. Betsy, Craig.
Hi. Oh, Craig, you need your own purse.
translation.es: Hola. Craig, necesitas tu propio bolso.

translation.en: -Did it work out? -Yeah.
It was very nice.
-You look lovely today. -Oh, thank you so much.
-Couldn't you just--? -You know I can't.
Son of a bitch.
-You ground yourself? -Yes, I grounded myself.
You gotta stop putting bacon on the list.
translation.es: Deja de incluir panceta en la lista.

translation.en: That cooler's looking like a trichinosis stew.
translation.es: Ese refrigerador empieza a parecer guiso de triquinosis.

translation.en: Perfect timing.
Professor Brans Vogelson?
University of Helsinki?
Yeah, you're gonna have to get that translated.
-Into Swedish? -Finnish.
Finish translating into--?
I'm sure there's someone at UNM who can do that.
translation.es: Seguro pueden hacerlo en la UNM.

translation.en: You do know I'm trying to start a legal practice?
translation.es: Intento empezar a ejercer como abogado.

translation.en: Vogelson's been working on the effects of electromagnetic fields on zebrafish and--
translation.es: Vogelson trabajó en los efectos de campos electromagnéticos sobre...

translation.en: Financial Times.
Yeah, I knew you missed it, so I figured, what the heck?
translation.es: Sabía que te lo perdiste, así que me dije: ¿Qué rayos?

translation.en: Thank you. I know it's expensive here.
translation.es: Gracias. Sé que aquí es caro.

translation.en: -That's not-- -I don't expect you to go out-of-pocket.
translation.es: -Eso no es... -No quiero que te quedes sin dinero.

translation.en: Go ahead, reimburse yourself.
Thanks.
Hey, Chuck, can you not read that for a second?
translation.es: Escucha, Chuck, ¿puedes no leer por un momento?

translation.en: Can we talk?
Are you all right? You look peaked.
I'm fine. Please, just sit.
You're not in trouble?
You gotta cash out.
-You gotta. -Again? Really?
There's no other way.
I know that you don't wanna hear it, but you've got to.
translation.es: Sé que no quieres escuchar, pero tienes que hacerlo.

translation.en: You know I'm going to beat this.
You know I'm going to get better.
Yeah, sure.
Well, then there's nothing more to talk about.
translation.es: Entonces, no hay nada más que hablar.

translation.en: I will beat this. Ergo, a falsis principiis proficisci.
translation.es: Lo superaré. Ergo, falsis principiis proficisci.

translation.en: -Meaning.... -That's not--
-Meaning.... -That's the one about false principles--
You proceed from false principles.
Your argument is built on quicksand, therefore it collapses.
translation.es: Tu argumento tendrá base débil, y colapsará.

translation.en: Yeah, you're not listening.
Fine. Let's take this to its logical conclusion.
translation.es: Bien. Llevémoslo a su conclusión lógica.

translation.en: In order to pay out my share...
translation.es: Para que yo pueda pagar mi parte...

translation.en: ...suppose my partners are forced to liquidate the firm.
translation.es: ...supón que mis socios se ven obligados a liquidar el estudio.

translation.en: -Then what? -That's their problem.
My clients are out in the cold.
My cases are scattered to the winds, 126 people lose their jobs.
translation.es: Mis casos serán papeles al viento, 126 personas quedarán sin empleo.

translation.en: What happens to your cronies in the mailroom?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasará con tus compinches de la sala de correspondencia?

translation.en: The assistants, paralegals, the janitorial staff...
translation.es: Los asistentes, pasantes, empleados de portería...

translation.en: ...all of them out on the street.
Your friend Kim, a promising career, over and done with.
translation.es: Tu amiga Kim, con carrera prometedora, en la calle.

translation.en: Hamlin owes you everything. You built that place singlehandedly...
translation.es: Hamlin te debe todo. Construiste ese lugar tú solo...

translation.en: ...while he was at Four Hills working on his bunker shot.
translation.es: ...mientras él estaba en Four Hills jugando golf.

translation.en: -Let's not exaggerate. I helped. -You helped.
All the more reason not to tear it down just for a little bit of cash.
translation.es: Mayor razón para no desmoronarlo por un poco de dinero.

translation.en: Chuck, I'm going under. Okay?
For the third time, with these bull-crap contract counsel--
translation.es: Por tercera vez, con este estúpido asesoramiento de contrato.

translation.en: -Bull crap? -Bull crap, pissant, PD cases...
...at 700 bucks a shot.
Public defender work is some of the best experience there is.
translation.es: Ser defensor público es una de las mejores experiencias.

translation.en: I just had a case, Chuck, with three clients.
translation.es: Tuve un caso, Chuck, de tres clientes.

translation.en: Arraignment, voir dire, jury trial, the whole nine yards.
translation.es: Lectura de acusaciones, voir dire, juicio, todo.

translation.en: You know what I took home? Seven hundred bucks.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué me llevé a casa? Setecientos dólares.

translation.en: I might as well head down to skid row and sell plasma.
translation.es: Podría ir a la zona marginal y vender plasma.

translation.en: You're representing people who have nowhere else to turn.
translation.es: Representas gente que no tiene a quién acudir.

translation.en: Money is beside the point.
Money is not beside the point. Money is the point.
translation.es: No es así. El dinero es lo que importa.

translation.en: I keep telling you, have patience. There are no shortcuts.
translation.es: Vivo diciéndote, ten paciencia. No hay atajos.

translation.en: -Do good work and the clients-- -The clients will come. Yeah, I know.
translation.es: -Haz buen trabajo y los clientes... -Vendrán. Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: Okay.
Hand to God, I wasn't gonna say this, but you are broke.
translation.es: Te lo juro por Dios, no te lo iba a decir pero estás en la ruina.

translation.en: I can't carry both of us. I've been trying like hell, but I can't.
translation.es: No puedo cargar con lo tuyo y lo mío. Lo intenté, pero no puedo.

translation.en: You're saying, what, you think you have to provide for me?
-I never asked you that. -You didn't have to ask, okay?
translation.es: -Nunca te lo pedí. -No tenías que pedirlo.

translation.en: I've been doing my damnedest, but the day of reckoning is here.
translation.es: He hecho lo mejor posible, pero llegó el día del Juicio Final.

translation.en: Soon, Chuck, you're gonna be out on the street...
translation.es: Pronto, Chuck, estarás en la calle...

translation.en: ...with all the electromagnetism in the world raining down on you.
translation.es: ...con todo el electromagnetismo del mundo cayéndote encima.

translation.en: Now, please, please, picture that...
...then tell me that money is beside the point.
translation.es: ...y luego dime que el dinero no importa.

translation.en: -This is what has you all worked up? -Yeah.
translation.es: -¿Esto es lo que te altera tanto? -Sí.

translation.en: Jimmy, there's nothing to worry about.
translation.es: Jimmy, no hay de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: -Here. -What is this?
A stipend. There's gonna be one every week.
translation.es: Un estipendio. Habrá uno cada semana.

translation.en: Eight hundred and fifty seven dollars from Hamlin Hamlin McGill.
translation.es: Son 857 dólares de Hamlin Hamlin McGill.

translation.en: I'm gonna pay him back. Every penny.
I didn't wanna take anything, but Howard was very insistent.
translation.es: Yo no quería nada, pero Howard insistió mucho.

translation.en: And I'm gonna pay you back too.
translation.es: Y también te pagaré a ti.

translation.en: -Hamlin was here? -It's not like I'm a recluse.
-He put his cell phone in the mailbox? -He understands the situation.
translation.es: -¿Puso su celular en el buzón? -Entiende la situación.

translation.en: -He grounded himself? -Of course.
And the two of you agreed that since, as everybody knows...
translation.es: ¿Y los dos acordaron que como todos saben...

translation.en: ...you're going back to work any day now, the firm should help you make ends meet?
translation.es: ...como un día volverás a trabajar, el bufete debe ayudar a mantenerte?

translation.en: That's correct, minus the sarcasm.
Hamlin's making you a chump.
I'm going to get better.
I'm gonna go back to work, and I'm picking up where I left off.
translation.es: ¡Volveré al trabajo y lo retomaré donde lo dejé!

translation.en: Sorry.
Sorry, Chuck.
I understand that you're trying to look out for me...
...but you're missing the bigger picture.
translation.es: ...pero no entiendes que esto va más allá.

translation.en: I got it.
Speaking of which....
Howard brought this.
-He's concerned. -What?
You have to admit, it could be confusing. Hamlin Hamlin McGill. James M. McGill.
translation.es: Debes admitir que es confuso. Hamlin Hamlin McGill. James M. McGill.

translation.en: -That's my name, I was born with it. I-- -Still.
translation.es: -Es mi nombre. Desde que nací. -Aun así.

translation.en: How about "Vanguard Law"?
Or "Gibraltar." Ple--
Wait, so I'm not supposed to use my name on Hamlin's say-so?
translation.es: Espera, ¿se supone que no debo usar mi nombre porque Hamlin lo dice?

translation.en: What's he gonna do, sue me?
Nobody wants to create an adversarial situation.
translation.es: Nadie quiere crear una situación conflictiva.

translation.en: I'm sure Howard would gladly pay the cost of new matchbooks and so on.
translation.es: Seguro que Howard con gusto pagaría nuevas cajas de fósforos y demás.

translation.en: It's simply a matter of professional courtesy.
translation.es: Es simplemente una cuestión de cortesía profesional.

translation.en: Chuck, whose side are you on?
There are no sides.
But Jimmy....
Wouldn't you rather build your own identity?
Why ride on someone else's coattails?
You wanna dance, Howard?
Let's dance.
Yeah, backside on it.
Go.
You can get closer than that, you bitch. Come on.
All right, here it comes.
There you go. Better.
-How was that? -It's all right. Here, take a look.
-So tighter. Everything-- -Tighter? What--? Tighter what?
I don't know, just stand tighter. You know what I mean?
translation.es: No sé, más cerca y firme. ¿Me entiendes?

translation.en: I don't know what you mean.
That's a-- We can call that a stylistic choice, I guess.
translation.es: Es un... Podemos llamarlo opción de estilo, creo.

translation.en: Hey, fellas. We got business.
translation.es: Hola, amigos. Tenemos negocios que discutir.

translation.en: How did you find us?
I know. Eerie, right?
Whoa, come on. Give me 30 seconds.
Could be the most profitable 30 seconds of your lives.
translation.es: Podrían ser los 30 segundos más redituables de su vida.

translation.en: Let me tell you about a young guy.
Actually, he's about your age.
He lived a long way from here...
...in a town called Cicero, Illinois.
And in Cicero, he was the man.
translation.es: Y en Cicero, era el rey.

translation.en: I mean, when he strolled down the street...
...all the corner boys would give him the high five.
translation.es: ...y los chicos de las esquinas le chocaban los cinco.

translation.en: All the finest babes would smile at him...
...and hope that he would smile back.
translation.es: ...y esperaban que él les devolviera la sonrisa.

translation.en: They called him Slippin' Jimmy...
...and everybody wanted to be his friend.
translation.es: ...y todos querían ser amigos de él.

translation.en: Slippin' Jimmy.
What the hell kind of name is that?
Well, I'll tell you now. Winters in Cicero are murder.
translation.es: Bueno, te diré. Los inviernos en Cicero son mortales.

translation.en: You guys, growing up out here in the Golden West, you don't know.
translation.es: Ustedes crecieron aquí en el Oeste dorado y no lo saben.

translation.en: Okay? I'm talking cold that'll freeze the snot right in your nose.
translation.es: Hablo de un frío que les congela los mocos de la nariz.

translation.en: I'm talking wind that'll cut through your jacket and carve you up like a Ginsu knife.
translation.es: Hablo de un viento que les atraviesa la chaqueta y corta como cuchillo.

translation.en: In fact, most folks in Cicero were scared of winter.
translation.es: La mayoría de los chicos de Cicero temían al invierno.

translation.en: But not Jimmy.
Jimmy would wait around all summer...
translation.es: Jimmy esperaba todo el verano y...

translation.en: ...and when September finally rolled around...
...and he'd feel that first cold wind come sweeping off Lake Michigan...
translation.es: ...y sentía el primer viento frío que soplaba del lago Michigan...

translation.en: ...he knew it was coming.
Was it Christmas? Was it Kwanzaa?
Better. It was slip-and-fall season.
translation.es: Algo mejor. Era la temporada de resbalar y caer.

translation.en: As soon as it was cold enough, he'd find a nice, smooth patch of ice.
translation.es: En cuanto hacía suficiente frío, buscaba nieve suave.

translation.en: State Street was good, Michigan Avenue was better.
translation.es: La calle State era buena, la avenida Michigan, mejor.

translation.en: He'd pick his spot, wait for it to get busy...
translation.es: Elegía su lugar, esperaba que hubiera movimiento...

translation.en: ...then he'd walk out on the ice and boom.
translation.es: ...y luego pasaba caminando por el hielo y pum.

translation.en: He would biff it so hard...
...people would come running from five blocks away.
translation.es: ...que la gente iba corriendo desde cinco cuadras.

translation.en: Yeah, but did he collect?
"Did he collect?" Slippin' Jimmy had it dialed in.
translation.es: ¿Si ganaba? Jimmy el Resbaladizo lo tenía controlado.

translation.en: One good fall, he'd clear 6, 8 grand.
translation.es: Con una buena caída, cobraba seis, ocho mil.

translation.en: That'd keep him in Old Milwaukee and Maui Waui right through Labor Day.
translation.es: Eso le garantizaba cerveza y hierba hasta el Día del Trabajo.

translation.en: -Eight grand? -Eight grand.
Now, see, I look at you guys, I see potential.
translation.es: Los miro y veo potencial, chicos.

translation.en: The skateboard's a nice wrinkle, that makes it a year-round gig.
translation.es: La patineta es buen recurso, válido todo el año.

translation.en: Clearly, you know how to take a header. Right?
translation.es: Es claro que saben caer de cabeza, ¿no?

translation.en: But I gotta ask you...
...your best day ever, how much did you clear?
-Six hundred and thirty. -Six hundred and thirty.
Six hundred and thirty bucks? Was that for one fall?
-Two. -Two falls in one day?
-Even at your age, that's gotta hurt. -True that.
All right. Well, I got a job for you.
How's 2 grand sound?
Two grand for one hit?
One hit.
Plus you get to learn from the best.
-Nice boat. -Yeah.
Discrete, like a stripper pole in a mosque.
translation.es: Discreto, como una desnudista en una mezquita.

translation.en: Forget the boat. Look at the car. You know what that is?
translation.es: Olviden el bote. Miren el auto. ¿Saben qué es?

translation.en: -I don't know, a station wagon? -It's a Mercury.
A 1988 Mercury Sable wagon.
Remember it. Burn it into your brains, you got it?
It's a Mercury Sable wagon, sure.
Close your eyes. What color is it?
translation.es: Cierren los ojos. ¿De qué color es?

translation.en: -Brown. -Brown.
No, it's medium sandalwood.
Keep your eyes closed. How does the license plate start?
translation.es: Cierren los ojos. ¿Cómo empieza la matrícula?

translation.en: -Four. -Give those gentlemen a gold star.
Betsy Kettleman's her name.
Every weekday between 2:25 and 2:50 she comes through here...
translation.es: Cada semana entre las 2:25 y 2:50 pasa por aquí...

translation.en: ...on her way to pick up her kids at Kit Carson Elementary.
translation.es: ...a retirar a sus hijos por la Primaria Kit Carson.

translation.en: You need a place where she's gonna slow down, right?
translation.es: Necesitan un lugar donde ella aminore, ¿no?

translation.en: -Yeah. -All right. Well, there you go.
She slows down, she hangs a right...
translation.es: Aminora la marcha, dobla a la derecha...

translation.en: ...you come shooting out of there and do what you did to me.
translation.es: ...ustedes salen como rayo de allí y hacen lo que me hicieron.

translation.en: You go ass over teakettle, you make it a blue-ribbon special.
translation.es: Salen como escupida en plancha caliente, primer premio.

translation.en: When she gets out of the car, you're suffering Saint Sebastian, right?
translation.es: Cuando ella baje del auto, estarás sufriendo como San Sebastián.

translation.en: You're the hammer. You get in her face, you scare the bejeezus out of her.
translation.es: Tú eres el martillo. Le darás a ella en la cara, la aterrarás.

translation.en: Give me your phone.
-It's kind of busy here, don't you think? -Yeah. Witnesses are good.
translation.es: -Hay mucho movimiento aquí. -Sí. Los testigos son algo bueno.

translation.en: Witnesses are pressure, all right?
Now, once you've got her good and rattled...
translation.es: Una vez que la tengan bien alterada...

translation.en: ...then you call for an ambulance, but really you're calling for me.
translation.es: ...pedirán una ambulancia, pero en realidad me llamarán a mí.

translation.en: I'm number one on your speed dial, next to your weed dealer.
translation.es: Soy el primero, con su traficante de hierba.

translation.en: You call me, I hotfoot it over here. I just "happened" to be driving by.
translation.es: Me llamarán y me presentaré aquí. Pasaba por casualidad.

translation.en: I stop to see what the trouble is, and this is the important part...
translation.es: Pararé a ver qué pasa, y esto es lo importante...

translation.en: ...you don't know me. We've never met. You got it?
translation.es: ...ustedes no me conocen, nunca nos vimos. ¿Entienden?

translation.en: -Sure. -Okay.
Now, I'm Mrs. K's white knight. We go mano a mano.
translation.es: Seré el salvador de la señora. Pasaremos a las manos.

translation.en: You light into me, okay? Get nasty.
No touching, leave the hair alone...
translation.es: No me tocarán, el cabello queda fuera...

translation.en: ...but otherwise, you know, open season.
Yell, stomp, call me a douche bag.
translation.es: Gritarán, patearán al suelo, me insultarán.

translation.en: I'm gonna play it cool, give you back some of the razzmatazz...
translation.es: Yo actuaré tranquilo, les devolveré algunos golpes...

translation.en: ...and once she's seen the fireworks, you fold like a lawn chair. Happy ending.
translation.es: ...y cuando ella haya visto eso, se replegarán como silla. Final feliz.

translation.en: -When do we get our money? -After.
-"After." -After.
You get paid when I get paid. I'm the rising tide that raises all dinghies.
translation.es: Les pagaré cuando me paguen. Soy la marea que eleva los botes.

translation.en: Now, pop quiz. What's the car?
-Mercury Sable wagon. -Baby-poop brown.
-Okay, do you know me? -No.
Damn straight. Go with God.
Well, I'm just glad I happened to be passing by.
translation.es: Me alegra haber pasado por casualidad.

translation.en: Happy to be of help, Betsy. May I call you Betsy?
translation.es: Me alegra poder ayudar, Betsy. ¿Puedo llamarte Betsy?

translation.en: Please, call me James.
Oh, the kid will be fine. Don't worry.
translation.es: El chico estará bien. No te preocupes.

translation.en: He just got his bell rung a little. I'll handle that.
translation.es: Solo fue un sacudón. Me encargaré de eso.

translation.en: Oh, no.
Oh, no, no. I wouldn't think of taking your money for this, so....
translation.es: No, no. Ni se me ocurriría aceptar dinero por esto.

translation.en: The embezzlement case? Yes, I'd be happy to talk it over.
translation.es: ¿El caso de malversación? Sí. Con gusto lo tomaría.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
Two-minute warning. Two-minute warning.
translation.es: Advertencia de dos minutos. Dos minutos.

translation.en: Got it.
Oh, my God.
What happened?
Call 911.
Oh, my God. Cal. Cal.
Look at me. Are you okay? Buddy, say something.
Cal, look at me. Come on already.
What is she doing in there? She making a sandwich?
Where's her sense of responsibility?
-What? -What?
Hey. What the...?
Funny to run into you, Betsy. I was just strolling the neighborhood.
translation.es: Qué curioso toparme contigo. Daba un paseo por el barrio.

translation.en: You were in an accident? Oh, that's....
Come on.
-Yeah. -She took off on us.
-She what? -It was textbook, man.
We were diamonds. But then she just took off.
translation.es: Lo hicimos a la perfección. Pero se fue.

translation.en: Okay, wait. She hit and run?
That's what I'm saying. She bailed and wailed.
Okay, just stay where you are. I'll come get you.
translation.es: Bien, quédense donde están. Iré por ustedes.

translation.en: No, no, no. Screw that, man. We're following her.
translation.es: No. A la mierda con esto. La seguiremos.

translation.en: You're-- How are--? You're following her how?
We got our ways, yo.
Okay, okay, okay. New plan. New plan.
translation.es: Está bien. Plan nuevo. Plan nuevo.

translation.en: You do know me. I'm your lawyer. You got that? I'll meet you at the school.
translation.es: Me conocen. Soy su abogado. Los veré en la escuela.

translation.en: No, she's way past the school.
She hooked a left on Juan Tabo, now she's coming into Holiday Park.
translation.es: Tomó la izquierda por Juan Tabo, está volviendo a Holiday Park.

translation.en: Okay, stay with her. When she gets where she's going...
translation.es: Síganla. Cuando ella llegue a destino...

translation.en: ...wherever that is, don't do anything.
-Wait for me. -Wait for what?
You haven't been right even once. Slippin' Jimmy my ass.
translation.es: No pegaste una. Jimmy el Resbaladizo, las pelotas.

translation.en: You fell into the honeypot, kid. You get it? Hit-and-run is a felony.
translation.es: Hallaron un tesoro. ¿Entiendes? Ser conductor fugitivo es delito.

translation.en: -So what? -"So what?" So more money.
He says we fell in the honeypot.
translation.es: Dice que dimos con el tesoro.

translation.en: -He says more money. -So, what do we need him for?
translation.es: -Es más dinero. -¿Entonces, para qué lo necesitamos?

translation.en: Cal, Lars, whoever--
Oh, damn it.
Come on, come on.
-Do it, do it, do it. -Son of a bitch.
Come on. Come on.
-Hey, your leg. -Oh, I'm gonna do this one.
Okay. Hey. Hey. Yo, hold up.
Hey, yeah, you. What is the matter with you?
-You hit and run. -You ran him over.
You felonied my brother.
translation.es: Le hizo un delito a mi hermano.

translation.en: -Habla English. -We call-- We call la policia.
-La policia gonna be pissed. -I see you hit him.
You see that windshield? You did that.
-I did that. -You did that.
-You did that to me. -Now you pay.
Make with the dinero.
Sí, righteous dinero.
-Okay. -Yeah, that's what I'm talking about.
Okay.
Let's go.
-Is that money? -Yeah.
Watch the step. Watch the step.
Watch it. Watch the step.
Where are you?
Holiday Park.
Mrs. Kettleman, Betsy, what are you doing here?
Hit-and-run? That's very serious.
I can mediate. I represent their parents, so....
translation.es: Puedo ser mediador. Represento a sus padres, así que...

translation.en: Come on, come on.
Open up, officer of the court.
Open up in the name of the law.
translation.es: Abran en nombre de la ley.

translation.en: Good afternoon, this--
